Title: ELSA-2012-0862:  Oracle Linux 6 kernel security, bug fix and enhancement update (MODERATE)
Description:
[2.6.32-279.el6]
- [netdrv] mlx4: ignore old module parameters (Jay Fenlason) [830553]

[2.6.32-278.el6]

[2.6.32-276.el6]

[2.6.32-275.el6]
